content.query:
--drop view Bronze.vw_trip_data
GO
CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green_patitioned_table
AS
SELECT 
    result.filename()   as file_name,
    result.filepath() as file_path,
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    result.* 
   
FROM    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )  
WITH 
(
    
) as [result]
;
